snippet: The Rangers beat the Capitals, 2-1, in Game 3 of their playoff series -- a three-overtime, 114-minute masterpiece of frantic saves, bloodied jerseys, blocked shots, hard checks and hit posts.
abstract: The Rangers beat the Capitals, 2-1, in Game 3 of their playoff series -- a three-overtime, 114-minute masterpiece of frantic saves, bloodied jerseys, blocked shots, hard checks and hit posts.

headline.main: Breaking Down the Rangers' Marathon Game
